title: French Embassy OST recognizes SCET Deplastify the Planet course on 5th anniversary of the Paris Agreement
author: Keith McAleer
excerpt:
SCET will offer its Deplastify the Planet course in collaboration with Schoolab in Spring 2021. Participating students will have the opportunity to create a venture project that creates practical solutions for companies to reduce their use of plastic.
